messages.msgSnippet: Norma may even be on this list.... but I can assure you she s a real person, living in PA.  :)  I ll forward this on to her. LisaKK ... From: Russ Anderson

Norma may even be on this list.... but I can assure you she's a real person,
living in PA. :) I'll forward this on to her.

LisaKK
----- Original Message -----
From: "Russ Anderson" <anderclan@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 21, 2000 9:34 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Needing Some Information


> Can anyone help me find out alittle more about the lady who wrote the
essay
> titled, "Swinging" by Norma. I forwarded the article to my school
teacher
> Aunt today, to try to help her to understand unschooling. She has been
> asking me questions and I thought she was truly sincere. Well she doesn't
> think its about a real child.. that its just made up. I would like to be
> able to prove her wrong.
> Thanks,
> Julie in MO

messages.subject: Needing Some Information
messages.msgSnippet: Can anyone help me find out alittle more about the lady who wrote the essay titled, Swinging  by Norma.  I forwarded the article to my school teacher Aunt
messages.messageBody:
Can anyone help me find out alittle more about the lady who wrote the essay
titled, "Swinging" by Norma. I forwarded the article to my school teacher
Aunt today, to try to help her to understand unschooling. She has been
asking me questions and I thought she was truly sincere. Well she doesn't
think its about a real child.. that its just made up. I would like to be
able to prove her wrong.
Thanks,
Julie in MO
